content: Well, if “The Donald” says it………. Or “say-s”, as he pronounced it on YouTube, providing a clear explanation of why he feels teleprompters should be forbidden in a rare attempt at reading (providing explanations for both why he loves the under-educated, and why he plans to defund public education. Also, why he’ll likely get away with it.) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aAN6fPkPbLY (approx. 1:42) Also trying to read “smooth-a-ly”. (0:20) President Obama, we miss your class, intellect, compassion and honesty already.
